amendment.description: To make available to the Department of Homeland Security additional funds.

action.text: Amendment SA 3618, as previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3618 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3618 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S9056; text: CR S9056) To make available to the Department of Homeland Security additional funds.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3618 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Frist.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3618 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
